name: Cyber Subsist
description:
A cyberpunk themed platform survival shooter.
Survive ten waves of re-spawning cyber enemies.
Shoot using the mouse or press z to toggle auto fire.
Press e to change the angle of your shot.
On a touch device a touch controller will appear below the game.
On touch devices press the c touch button to toggle auto shooting.
And the d touch button to change shot angle.
Have fun!
